The `#b22222` colour is a dark red colour, also known as firebrick.
It is a web safe colour.
The #b22222 colour hex could be obtained by blending #ff4444 with #640000.
Closest websafe colour is: #cc3333.

```{r}
my_colour <- "#b22222"
```
